creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
see URL for requirements.

The only point I'm sure is correct is the domain name, all other things must be checked for Ant, Ivy and all subprojects.

We'll also need (TM)s inside the logos, does anybody posess the skills to add them?

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
all xdocs now contain proper "Apache" references for all products and the download and index pages contain descriptions of Ant with svn revision 1033950

I haven't checked the static pages like the manual.

This is just the second of five points of the checklist 8-(

I've opened JIRA tickets for Ivy and IvyDE since I don't know how they build their site (and don't want to learn it right now either ;-)

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IVY-1249
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IVYDE-264

Helping hands more than welcome.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: OK, http://www.apache.org/foundation/marks/pmcs#naming should be ready for the main Ant website, Ivy and IvyDE need to be done - as need to be the four remaining items from the checklist.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: the required navigation links are on the main site now.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: trademark attributes are done for the Ant site

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
DOAP files are there for Ant, Ivy, IvyDE and all "proper" Antlibs.

Need help with logos.
